name: Xythrax
description1: Sizzlemander Slap: Deal a 75, 3 turn DoT and add a round to your HoT [0 pips]
description2: Reptile Incursion: Deal 50 damage and summon a minion if enemy has a DoT [0 pips]
description3: Kraken Embers: Clear enemy shield for 150, 3 turn HoT on self then deal 100 damage [1 pip]
description4: Slow Burn: Place a 150, 3 turn DoT and an afterlife that gives your team a 75, 3 turn HoT [1 pip]
description5: Blistering Wyvern: Deal a 450, 3 turn DoT and detonate if your HP is greater than 50% [4 pips]
description6: Dragon's Scald: Deal a 300, 3 turn DoT to all enemies and detonate if your HP is greater than 50% [5 pips]
description7: Fireman's Charge: Deal 200 damage and clear trap on self for a 150, 3 turn DoT on enemy [2 pips]
description8: Smog: Place a -50 accuracy mantle on all enemies and add a round to your team's HoTs [3 pips]
description9: Mr. Blast Furnace: Deal a 225, 3 turn DoT and clear enemy shield for a -50 accuracy mantle [2 pips]
description10: Skyfire: Deal 250 damage to all enemies and activate a HoT for whole team [5 pips]

name: Xarthax The Bitter
description4: Dragon Skin: Place a 100 shield and give whole team a stun block [2 pips]
description5: Icy Rage: Clear self of a mantle for a 75 weakness on enemy then deal 225 damage [3 pips]
description6: War Cry: Deal 200 damage to all enemies and taunt for 2 turns [5 pips]
description7: Spiteful Resolve: Deal 50 damage and gain a 75 shield if enemy has a mantle [0 pips]
description8: Press Advantage: Place a 75 trap or clear blade for a 125 trap [1 pip]
description9: Dragon Armor: Place 200 shield on own team and an extra 100 shield if team has a minion [4 pips]
description10: Cold Shoulder: Deal 150 damage and place a 50 weakness if you have taunt active [2 pips]

name: Varrax Greentalon
description1: Pip Hop: Gift 1 pip and clear trap for 1 pip to self [0 pips]
description2: Mythic Construct: Summon a pip minion [0 pips]
description3: It's Not A Trap!: Push a trap then deal 75 damage [1 pip]
description4: Sly Mountebank: Deal 150 damage and place 100 trap if enemy has a shield [2 pips]
description5: Pip Broker: Place a double pip, 4 turn bubble [3 pips]
description6: Charmed Scales: Sacrifice minion to deal 300 damage to all enemies and place 150 trap if enemy has a shield [5 pips]
description7: Pip Rally: Gift whole team 2 pips and clear trap for another pip to self [4 pips]
description8: Euryale's Wail: Deal 225 damage and stun enemy if you have a minion [3 pips]
description9: Butcher Bat: Deal 150 damage or 250 damage if you have a shield [2 pips]
description10: Protraction: Place afterlife on minion dealing 150 damage to all enemies [2 pips]

name: Nethellnax
description1: Charming Pixie: Place a 75, 3 turn HoT [0 pips]
description2: Resuscitate: Place afterlife that gives target 150 HP [0 pips]
description3: Sickly Moth: Deal 75 damage and push DoT onto enemy [1 pip]
description4: Stinging Scarab: Deal 150 damage and a 200, 4 turn DoT if enemy has a DoT [2 pips]
description5: Divine Spark: Heal for 150 HP and give a 50 blade [2 pips]
description6: Willow's Weal: Remove all DoTs from team then place a 150, 3 turn HoT on teammates [4 pips]
description7: Feisty Sprite: Place a 300, 4 turn HoT and a 100 shield if target has a blade [2 pips]
description8: Harvest Spirit: Place afterlife on enemy that gives team 100 blades then deal 150 damage [3 pips]
description9: The Pips Fairy: Heal whole team for 150 HP and gift 1 pip if they have a blade [4 pips]
description10: Fanged Spider: Deal 200 damage to all enemies and a 150, 3 turn DoT if enemy has a DoT [5 pips]

name: Saryx Legendwing
description1: Needful Things: Give enemy 4 cards: 100, 4 turn HoT on self for 0 pips [0 pips]
description2: Inhibit: Place a 75 weakness and steal enemy blade [0 pips]
description3: Malady: Deal a 150, 3 turn DoT and clear enemy HoT for a 75, 3 turn DoT [1 pip]
description5: Dark Animism: Deal 200 damage and gain a double pip, 3 turn bubble if you have a blade [3 pips]
description6: Terminal Illness: Deal a 300, 4 turn DoT to all enemies and clear enemy Hot for a 200, 4 turn DoT [5 pips]
description7: Miraculous Recovery: Place a -100 heal trap and steal a HoT [1 pip]
description8: Creeping Death: Deal a 500, 5 turn DoT [4 pips]
description9: Sudden Death: Place a 75 trap and detonate DoT if you have a shield [0 pips]
description10: Relentless Attack: Deal 250 damage to all enemies and place a -100 heal trap if enemy has a trap [5 pips]
